title: Flexbike Launch Notes
content:
# **FlexBike Reaches a Major Milestone**


We’re proud to announce that **FlexBike has officially migrated from React.js to Next.js** — a historic step for the platform and a major foundation for what comes next.


The new **FlexBike.app** is faster, smarter, and built for growth.


It now includes:


## For Rental Customers:

1. A great new search experience

![image.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/6210981a-e646-493c-b833-014f8616af9a/cb29f170-0de6-45de-843a-4b3ebd401514/image.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466ZLPCQREA%2F20251110%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20251110T144624Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjED8aCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIEZ9axpHccBwobZY7LaUme4KAVyO408yJkD5MIk2%2BalaAiAh%2BOf3phiVzpZBVuigzxDYve4LMWw87WZAVCjduCWDRSr%2FAwgHEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMBb6SJxla5w4l4%2F8dKtwD95ARR%2BLDsvIJlLgahx93eD5zVPr6hceaLFTLmxY7LmeW%2FdQtgRE5d3SBm0S1Z6FR%2BHfj7lbh0TfDgwH9%2BFJiRdIKhZgmFhcGnRJ9WO6HqMC%2BkbeFQxtuL17q55mLtyTn8amEwCfLSTS8UPEt3yxJXnTue%2FD%2BXOO2TeHspc82JDqfB%2FKIp5ooVbQ1SKcohAy4IXMn0qSM4uct6N13DlvbbQyhpAcy%2BaESMq1y1NNHc3j49kQLfvNfY2loaTUmPzP5bmfHsiwhUZ4%2Fw3FMIeWV9gjiX%2BYY31QFvvJlJ20zoaESX%2FlffMNSZEWwptmaHPrUJi0Wfa6kDzYbp3e%2FNGitDPxDFtEk3VIiNR5XpPrPCzu5TQLif0r41x6gyKzHljM%2FQyYx5hmDD9NCVSmk8LGeh43dbnTCOizKvleOKcrlyhpozCZqCv6Y2184Z%2FJAlME207EOE3T%2Bggd6dHQ5DOAdP0tmFjnpJMpE%2BFqlfTD%2FmE180kcLG%2B1hOpyQEj9FnoEu%2BmSTIl9h885yMufXaFGMPM8fXAkoZ3909iAwznLBAUTJkkBplhMYDOI6%2F3XEwphCfSCWeAuqC0h0WtklZezFvN8lZoVjcLWbl%2BXMDhW18EtCdt73uriiVa5NUhswoevHyAY6pgEdiINI%2FZ%2FU6tjzywoTPp6CLO0iQpHJNRYQavVT0CbpmH1zbio8aqcUkAG%2FCgMyMZ3uBbHL8oOxegzgyarQmXQGuHpngjV5KcDYXw96iGOulAuNl9ElIHPLkb9LtzPv%2B32879RF3G9DVINSMTa%2B6As79kPE0qA3W8aMD%2BE%2FJHSr1PuUu0495RKnQodd4Tmf7lS5wx%2BupSeVjZka4WjiMj5aGYQEkCV%2F&X-Amz-Signature=a7177c78078e8052a9dc008fd1f652a02058d4e0e3522581475dd528bf4a90eb&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-amz-checksum-mode=ENABLED&x-id=GetObject)

1. A fast and friendly booking experience

1. The same mature and secure Stripe Checkout

### For Partner Shops

1. **A sexy new booking website**

    ![image.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/6210981a-e646-493c-b833-014f8616af9a/397f7178-7c71-430a-85ab-fd1dfe80aee6/image.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB4664WQFZM4F%2F20251110%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20251110T144624Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjED8aCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCH1cb4jrSw5RziO0C%2F%2BLTy140WJrO5Te8RAuncFs34RECIQCzrtaQNy1DT0P3OUVIw12%2FID3Oy6oUsdCz5BbvBqXfWir%2FAwgIEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIM7dtRpiKkiVZYqogzKtwDHnHzzD1Jpn%2B8FqyrMxrnP%2FV5qpLZfYWiArgvsHxNAgjI7jwXra6L9bWN0%2FZhUGEkVhpfJvYvlGKe0MS0BrASVgWYfeEQTMx%2BpcSwlyaaO7KHHUwrqovtxsfJKNWdQN%2BrB3jLjbHVnDqVw9nX8UfVvJYR9S8JTcTMSSPQ3t0319%2BBUaCCpgLoBfCRxOxA%2F9w5mZ3PkdMEu2wWgh6AQrwGA57kAN0czeH8WBoiJD7d7sWQjgEyCZ8Y%2F8dzId1mK7%2FKc8j%2FSVjwQQvaLQFBglBgFydOI3Eu4K6RTQFPffsrMuLO%2FGwmTO0pI%2BCf1%2FgjiWZriLI%2BnNTum74GATqnmudh%2FafpOX451WjSG696J9FbwKY7yYS192sIXIGQgsXk4ed11t2bTcJtEjibIz9ILD76gmx0cc6CwmbZZoXqstki8q2ZO5AVE9YyPpiaOPg9m5ObF4vD3wQO6nyyMlp4%2FhNYbwQSKRmOG%2FI7sdT6pIUxJnvaKQwVnbl3YdadPQrcyIp6KkvZuqSgw%2F5nPsK8LZzcyA2%2BDZ%2Fe0s0w5pJ4Y0WMKaHvUQxW2Yk9rEoY99aknIwthxzcxj8JVjdL5vb2DyoGMTwKZluYBoHYrwJDQoWfVq%2B9mHQwbnSKIgg64SYwluvHyAY6pgHc7qCUIRTiObPPfTrc6felWURpezIbWlOLsQDDp48loBElWy%2B%2FU4lQGv3zIWA0HBsWesGfjE182Q5d0ybw5jSE%2Bljba4MO%2BurVT9Y513KIhvWdqa1lKd5zgi2TscumvV6UIl1D%2FFRvMLuBa183Thacv33MyOsGYM53GEYYgrjUXYZwzq%2FEymD%2BR8ISlg%2FUD0AX8yGtpDYY7fPHIlEUabyd7mzoh%2FnY&X-Amz-Signature=2fdc45dbbb0aea98aeea0f6f29f8e70df35fa52e5200f59002e668229c389076&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-amz-checksum-mode=ENABLED&x-id=GetObject)

2. **Cleaner URLs:**

`https://flexbike.app/YourCompany`


make it easy to remember your booking link, each url can have a QR code as well.



    Old booking links like


    `https://flexbike.app/book-now/[shop-name]` or `https://flexbike.app/book-now/[shop-id]`


    now automatically redirect to:


    `https://flexbike.app/[companySlug]`


    Example: [https://flexbike.app/bollu-garage](https://flexbike.app/bollu-garage)

1. **Backward Compatibility:**

    You can continue using your existing links if they’re embedded in other systems or workflows — they’ll still function normally.

2. **Booking Fees:**
    - **No booking fee** applies when a rider books directly on your shop page (e.g. `/bollu-garage`).
    - **A booking fee** applies when bookings are made via broader discovery pages (e.g. `/country/region/city`).
    - **Alternate variants** of your partner page (e.g. promotional versions) will continue to include standard booking fees.

### For Our Admins, and Coming Soon to bike shops:

- A powerful **Admin Dashboard** at [https://flexbike.app/admin](https://flexbike.app/admin)_(Use your flexbike.app email address to log in.)_

- A live **Booking Calendar** for managing upcoming rentals.

![image.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/6210981a-e646-493c-b833-014f8616af9a/50efcccd-428d-4e54-8bb5-37067b00d953/image.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466ZLPCQREA%2F20251110%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20251110T144624Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjED8aCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIEZ9axpHccBwobZY7LaUme4KAVyO408yJkD5MIk2%2BalaAiAh%2BOf3phiVzpZBVuigzxDYve4LMWw87WZAVCjduCWDRSr%2FAwgHEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIMBb6SJxla5w4l4%2F8dKtwD95ARR%2BLDsvIJlLgahx93eD5zVPr6hceaLFTLmxY7LmeW%2FdQtgRE5d3SBm0S1Z6FR%2BHfj7lbh0TfDgwH9%2BFJiRdIKhZgmFhcGnRJ9WO6HqMC%2BkbeFQxtuL17q55mLtyTn8amEwCfLSTS8UPEt3yxJXnTue%2FD%2BXOO2TeHspc82JDqfB%2FKIp5ooVbQ1SKcohAy4IXMn0qSM4uct6N13DlvbbQyhpAcy%2BaESMq1y1NNHc3j49kQLfvNfY2loaTUmPzP5bmfHsiwhUZ4%2Fw3FMIeWV9gjiX%2BYY31QFvvJlJ20zoaESX%2FlffMNSZEWwptmaHPrUJi0Wfa6kDzYbp3e%2FNGitDPxDFtEk3VIiNR5XpPrPCzu5TQLif0r41x6gyKzHljM%2FQyYx5hmDD9NCVSmk8LGeh43dbnTCOizKvleOKcrlyhpozCZqCv6Y2184Z%2FJAlME207EOE3T%2Bggd6dHQ5DOAdP0tmFjnpJMpE%2BFqlfTD%2FmE180kcLG%2B1hOpyQEj9FnoEu%2BmSTIl9h885yMufXaFGMPM8fXAkoZ3909iAwznLBAUTJkkBplhMYDOI6%2F3XEwphCfSCWeAuqC0h0WtklZezFvN8lZoVjcLWbl%2BXMDhW18EtCdt73uriiVa5NUhswoevHyAY6pgEdiINI%2FZ%2FU6tjzywoTPp6CLO0iQpHJNRYQavVT0CbpmH1zbio8aqcUkAG%2FCgMyMZ3uBbHL8oOxegzgyarQmXQGuHpngjV5KcDYXw96iGOulAuNl9ElIHPLkb9LtzPv%2B32879RF3G9DVINSMTa%2B6As79kPE0qA3W8aMD%2BE%2FJHSr1PuUu0495RKnQodd4Tmf7lS5wx%2BupSeVjZka4WjiMj5aGYQEkCV%2F&X-Amz-Signature=2c23aeef7a1aeece3b6bd5929cd6a493c453b263e0f3ebe837aa1625c03d9fdb&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-amz-checksum-mode=ENABLED&x-id=GetObject)

- A **Booking Metrics Dashboard** for real-time performance insights.
- A **Bookings & Reconciliation Table Dashboard** for tracking transactions and payouts.

---


This launch marks the start of a new era for FlexBike — faster technology, smarter tools, and a simpler experience for riders and shops alike.
